definition: Hmong or Miao ethnic group of southwest China/surname Miao

sentences.english: The existing vaccines can only reduce the amount of virus, rather than totally inactivating it.
sentences.chinese: 当前的疫苗只会减少病毒数量，并非真正杀灭病毒。

sentences.english: About 20 percent of the vaccine will be reserved for essential workers and the rest go to the public on a voluntary basis.
sentences.chinese: 有20%的疫苗将供收储，其馀面向公众自愿接种。

sentences.english: There's no difference between a cancer vaccine and any other cancer therapy.
sentences.chinese: 癌症疫苗和其他任何癌症治疗手段之间并无差别。

sentences.english: Vaccines and even staple food crops have been modified to achieve these goals.
sentences.chinese: 疫苗及甚至主粮作物已被修改去实现这些目标。

sentences.english: These vaccines protect you from getting infected with mumps.
sentences.chinese: 这些疫苗能够保护你免受腮腺炎感染。

sentences.english: From life machines to vaccination man has vastly improve the standard of living.
sentences.chinese: 从生命机器到疫苗接种，人们大大地提高了生活水平。

sentences.english: Over 22 million doses of squalene-containing flu vaccine have been administered.
sentences.chinese: 已接种的含角鲨烯流感疫苗数量超过2200万剂。

sentences.english: Replacing thiomersal in vaccines would require regulatory approval.
sentences.chinese: 替换疫苗中的硫柳汞还需要管制审批。

sentences.english: Transgenic plant as plant-derived vaccine is prospect in the production of FMD vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 利用转基因植物生产植物源性的口蹄疫疫苗前景广阔。

sentences.english: We definitely do not blame vaccines.
sentences.chinese: 我们肯定不会责备疫苗。

sentences.english: Vaccine greatly reduces the number of polio cases.
sentences.chinese: 索克疫苗极大地减少了患病人数。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare purified tick - borne encephalitis vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备森林脑炎纯化疫苗。

sentences.english: Then there is the much-ballyhooed but ultimately disproved link to vaccines.
sentences.chinese: 接着又一些大肆报道，但最后证实与疫苗有关。

sentences.english: The yellow fever vaccine used must be approved by WHO.
sentences.chinese: 使用的黄热病疫苗必须经世卫组织批准。

sentences.english: We can, for the first time, think about a universal influenza vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们首次想到一种普适性的流感疫苗。

sentences.english: A child receives a measles vaccine from a doctor at Bozhou, Anhui province.
sentences.chinese: 一个孩子在安徽省博州市接受麻疹疫苗。

definition: polio/abbr. for 脊髓灰質炎|脊髓灰质炎[ji3 sui3 hui1 zhi4 yan2]
epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])
